item.title: Adding Commands PK Planet source
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Mr Firecape, post:6, topic:350573”]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staffarea”) && (!isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1))) {
triggerTele(2525, 4776, 0);[/quote]
Why did you quote that? To get a bigger post count? moron -.-
For the flamers:
I quoted it to show you your error, and if i didn’t quote it, how else would i tell him >.>

item.title: Adding Commands PK Planet source
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Firecape Mr Firecape
item.description:
@Mr_Firecape wrote:

if i add any command this is what happens

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:395: class, interface, or enum ex
pected
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("::staffarea") && playerRights >= 1) {
^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:397: class, interface, or enum ex
pected
teleportToY = 4776;
^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:398: class, interface, or enum ex
pected
sendMessage(“tele”);
^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:399: class, interface, or enum ex
pected
}
^
4 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

(this is the command above)

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Commands PK Planet source
item.dc:creator: @server868 server868
item.description:
@server868 wrote:

Ok so i got my server up and running and i was wondering how to add commands to the server?

its pk planet

here is my command:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("::staffarea") && playerRights >= 1) {
teleportToX = 2525;
teleportToY = 4776;
sendMessage(“tele”);
}

Read full topic
